Key Match Events: Anthony Davis scored 19 points in the first half
LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 19 points, 16 assists, and 10 rebounds
Anthony Davis exited the game with an eye injury
Post-Match Reflections: The Toronto Raptors gave a good fight, but playing on short rest and without key players proved too much to overcome
Miscellaneous Highlights: The LA Lakers trailed by 10 points early in the game and trailed 34-26 after the first 12 minutes
The LA Lakers outscored their opponents 97-69 in the next three quarters to get the decisive win

Jaxson Hayes stepped up in Anthony Davis' absence
